author: smorgan
title: Anthony Martial arrives at Manchester United training in cab…and wondering if he’s done enough to secure Old Trafford future
text:
EFL Taxi for Martial? Anthony Martial arrives at Manchester United training in cab…and wondering if he’s done enough to secure Old Trafford future 
France star was given a chance to shine in FA Cup clash with Wigan after Jose Mourinho raised questions about him realising his potential Pictured
